text: The flag of New York City was a tricolor of blue, white, and orange with a coat of arms charged in the center of the white stripe. While the meaning of the colors has changed over time, these three colors were adopted by flag of New Amsterdam. The ratio of the flag is 4:7. ==Related pages== * Flags of cities of the United States * New York City * Coat of arms of New York ==References== New York City Category:Flags with coats of arms Category:New York City
title: Flag of New York City
